data.text: Utuu Gooftaan iddoo aarsaa bira dhaabatuu nan arge; innis akkana jedhe:
Yoo isaan boolla qilee qotatan iyyuu
Yoo diinonni isaanii boojiʼanii isaan fudhatan,
Gooftaan, Waaqayyo Waan Hunda Dandaʼu lafa ni tuqa;
inni darbii isaa ol dheeraa samii irratti ijaarratee
Cubbamoonni saba koo gidduu jiraatan hundi
kunis akka isaan hambaa Edoomii fi
Waaqayyo akkana jedha; “Kunoo, barri itti namni haamu tokko isa qotu qaqqabu,
Ani saba koo Israaʼelin boojuudhaa nan deebisa.
Ani Israaʼeloota biyya ofii isaanii keessa nan dhaaba;
